name: All For Her
description:
Game realized for the RPG Maker MZ "You Got It, Now Use It!" Game Jam organized by Studio Blue. (https://itch.io/jam/rpg-maker-mz-you-got-it-now-use-it-game-jam)

Play as three children as they explore a mansion! Unveil the story that surrounds it, but keep your sanity while doing so.

This game has been made in the span of 2 weeks. I hope you'll enjoy it.

(09/14/2020 - 9:50 PM (2:50 PM, Central US Time): The game got updated to add a new animation to help players get a key item necessary to progress. If you downloaded the game prior to that point, please consider updating it.)
